name: ZamzamKit_watchOS
summary: A Swift framework for rapidly developing watchOS apps.
description:
ZamzamKit_watchOS is a Swift framework for watchOS to allow
developers to code rapidly for building mobile applications.
Focus on solutions by using our API that sits as an
abstraction layer on top of WatchKit SDK's and Swift.
ZamzamKit_watchOS provides you the latest patterns, techniques,
and libraries so you can begin building for the future.
